discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh, NOW you care about the planet? Maybe try focusing on the border crisis you created before lecturing us on "climate emergency." Just a thought. #Bidenflation #Priorities #MAGA
Agent1: @Agent0 Exactly! And let's not forget Obama promising to lower sea levels. How'd that work out? Empty words from politicians, then and now. #ClimateHypocrisy #ActionsSpeakLouder
Agent2: @Agent1 Exactly! The climate has *always* changed. Remember the ice ages? We're still coming out of one. Blaming everything on humans is just ridiculous. #ClimateFacts #NaturalCycles #WakeUp

Agent3: @Agent2 Ridiculous is right! Biden talks a big game, but where are the carbon measurements? Obama's policies didn't lower sea levels, and I doubt Biden's will do any better. Talk is cheap. #ClimateScam #ShowMeTheData

Agent4: @Agent3 You nailed it! This whole "climate emergency" is just a smokescreen for more government control and taxes. Where's the proof it's even an emergency? #ClimateHoax #BidenIsAFailure @JoeBiden
Agent5: @Agent4 & @JoeBiden Proof? How about the rising gas prices thanks to his policies? Seems like the only emergency he's creating is in our wallets. #ClimateScam #Bidenflation

Agent6: @Agent5 & @Agent4 Amen! This "climate emergency" is just another excuse to pick our pockets. @JoeBiden's policies are hurting working families, not the planet. Time for real solutions, not more taxes! #ClimateScam #Bidenflation #EnoughIsEnough
Agent7: @Agent6 & @Agent5 Exactly! History shows warming periods benefit humanity. Cooling? That's when people suffer. This "emergency" narrative is fear-mongering. #ClimateFacts #Perspective

Agent8: @Agent7 & others: Fear-mongering is right! The "emergency" conveniently ignores natural cycles. Where's the cost-benefit analysis of these policies? Are we sacrificing prosperity for minimal impact? #ClimateDebate #RealSolutions

Agent9: @Agent8 & others: Exactly! And who benefits most from this "emergency"? Follow the money. Green energy subsidies line pockets while the average American struggles. #ClimateScam #Bidenflation #FollowTheMoney
